UserComments.Comment: All upgraded equipment now. Parking will be chargable from April 1st 2017 but electricity still free so that shold reduce abuse of parking and charging point.So I think that is fair enough.

The signage and road markings for this site are present, but the equipment itself has been damaged and removed. Only the guard rails and the end of a cable remain, covered in protective tape. Also noted that this site does not currently appear on the Charge-Your -Car Web site; I'll be interested to know whether it is to be renewed or what other plans there are for it, as there are no others for some miles.
Had planned to use one of these chargers en- route from the Midlands to mid-Wales. It wasn't our day. The High Street and car park were being used for the annual Town festivalðŸ˜­

UsageCost: Inclusive; for Polar Plus subscription members only

AddressInfo.Title: Mill Street Car Park
AddressInfo.AccessComments:
LHS of car park near disabled bays. Parking fees apply. In long stay car park. 
No eligibility restrictions. Length of stay = long stay (7 days a week). Free parking for electric vehicles whilst recharging.
